title: Everglades National Park: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics               Park Statistics       EVERGLADES NATIONAL PARK VISITOR STUDY  Every 5 years the park conducts an in depth study through surveys to better understand who our typical visitor is.  Click here for the 2008 Visitor Study  All National Park Service Units report their annual visitation for inclusion in national statistics.  These can be retrieved as either annual numbers or a variety of other formats.  Click here for annual visitation statistics for Everglades National Park.  If you'd like more details on this parks visitation or others in the National Park System click on more under NPS Park statistics to the right.
